org.apache.accumulo.cluster

Interface AccumuloConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MiniAccumuloConfigImpl

    public interface AccumuloConfig
    Configuration class for an AccumuloCluster (Experimental, not guaranteed to stay backwards compatible)
    Since:
    1.6.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccumuloCluster build()
      Build the appropriate AccumuloCluster from this configuration
      long getDefaultMemory() 
      String getInstanceName() 
      long getMemory(ServerType serverType) 
      String[] getNativeLibPaths() 
      int getNumTservers() 
      String getRootPassword() 
      Map<String,String> getSiteConfig() 
      int getZooKeeperPort() 
      AccumuloConfig setDefaultMemory(long memory, MemoryUnit memoryUnit)
      Sets the default memory size to use.
      AccumuloConfig setInstanceName(String instanceName)
      Calling this method is optional.
      AccumuloConfig setMemory(ServerType serverType, long memory, MemoryUnit memoryUnit)
      Sets the amount of memory to use in the master process.
      AccumuloConfig setNativeLibPaths(String... nativePathItems)
      Sets the path for processes to use for loading native libraries
      AccumuloConfig setNumTservers(int numTservers)
      Calling this method is optional.
      AccumuloConfig setSiteConfig(Map<String,String> siteConfig)
      Calling this method is optional.

      Calling this method is optional.
      AccumuloConfig setZooKeeperStartupTime(long zooKeeperStartupTime)
      Configure the time to wait for ZooKeeper to startup.

    • Method Detail

      • setNumTservers

        AccumuloConfig setNumTservers(int numTservers)
        Calling this method is optional. If not set, it defaults to two.
        Parameters:
        numTservers - the number of tablet servers that mini accumulo cluster should start

      • setInstanceName

        AccumuloConfig setInstanceName(String instanceName)
        Calling this method is optional. If not set, defaults to 'miniInstance'

      • setSiteConfig

        AccumuloConfig setSiteConfig(Map<String,String> siteConfig)
        Calling this method is optional. If not set, it defaults to an empty map.
        Parameters:
        siteConfig - key/values that you normally put in accumulo-site.xml can be put here.

      • setZooKeeperPort

        AccumuloConfig setZooKeeperPort(int zooKeeperPort)
        Calling this method is optional. A random port is generated by default
        Parameters:
        zooKeeperPort - A valid (and unused) port to use for the zookeeper

      • setZooKeeperStartupTime

        AccumuloConfig setZooKeeperStartupTime(long zooKeeperStartupTime)
        Configure the time to wait for ZooKeeper to startup. Calling this method is optional. The default is 20000 milliseconds
        Parameters:
        zooKeeperStartupTime - Time to wait for ZooKeeper to startup, in milliseconds
        Since:
        1.6.1

      • setMemory

        AccumuloConfig setMemory(ServerType serverType,
                       long memory,
                       MemoryUnit memoryUnit)
        Sets the amount of memory to use in the master process. Calling this method is optional. Default memory is 128M
        Parameters:
        serverType - the type of server to apply the memory settings
        memory - amount of memory to set
        memoryUnit - the units for which to apply with the memory size

      • setDefaultMemory

        AccumuloConfig setDefaultMemory(long memory,
                              MemoryUnit memoryUnit)
        Sets the default memory size to use. This value is also used when a ServerType has not been configured explicitly. Calling this method is optional. Default memory is 128M
        Parameters:
        memory - amount of memory to set
        memoryUnit - the units for which to apply with the memory size

      • getSiteConfig

        Map<String,String> getSiteConfig()
        Returns:
        a copy of the site config

      • getZooKeeperPort

        int getZooKeeperPort()
        Returns:
        The configured ZooKeeper port

      • getInstanceName

        String getInstanceName()
        Returns:
        name of configured instance

      • getMemory

        long getMemory(ServerType serverType)
        Parameters:
        serverType - get configuration for this server type
        Returns:
        memory configured in bytes, returns default if this server type is not configured

      • getDefaultMemory

        long getDefaultMemory()
        Returns:
        memory configured in bytes

      • getRootPassword

        String getRootPassword()
        Returns:
        the root password of this cluster configuration

      • getNumTservers

        int getNumTservers()
        Returns:
        the number of tservers configured for this cluster

      • getNativeLibPaths

        String[] getNativeLibPaths()
        Returns:
        the paths to use for loading native libraries

      • setNativeLibPaths

        AccumuloConfig setNativeLibPaths(String... nativePathItems)
        Sets the path for processes to use for loading native libraries
        Parameters:
        nativePathItems - the nativePathItems to set

      • build

        AccumuloCluster build()
                      throws IOException
        Build the appropriate AccumuloCluster from this configuration
        Returns:
        An AccumuloCluster
        Throws:
        IOException
